page.title: 09Trout Fishing in Spaxton.
page.content: Hawkridge Reservoir is one of five reservoirs on which the Wessex Water Authority operates a Trout fishery. The reservoir is stocked on a weekly basis with both Brown and Rainbow Trout ranging in size from 1lb to 10lbs in weight. During the 1984 season a total of 4,600 trout were stocked into Hawkridge Reservoir. The fishery attracts on average 1100 day ticket fishermen per season in addition to the 50 season permit holders who fish at the reservoir on a regular basis. Season 30th March ---13th October. Day permit Â£5.50 Season Â£120.
